content: pattern row 2 of pattern for 15 stitches pm m1 pm knit remaining stitches of round in turtle tracks lace pattern as established 1 stitch between markers round 3-4 knit in pattern to marker sm k1 sm work remaining stitches in pattern round 5 knit in pattern row 5 of pattern to marker sm m1r k1 m1l sm knit remaining stitches in pattern 3 stitches between markers continue in this manner increasing two stitches on each side of the gusset every 3 rounds and knitting the stitches between the markers the increases will occur on pattern row 2 5 8 11 14 17 20 23 26 there will be 15 17 sts between markers work two more row without increases on the next row pattern row 26 29 work across 15 stitches place the 15 17 gusset stitches on waste yarn removing markers continue knitting in pattern working until 3/4 shy of desired length preferably ending with row 8 or row 16 of the pattern repeat work in k2p2 rib for 6 row bind off with a stretchy bind off chart 2 thumb gusset increases dk weight thumb using dpns or magic loop circular pick up and knit 5 sts along the upper edge then knit the 15 17 stitches from the waste yarn there will be 20 22 sts on your needles for sportweight yarn next round ssk k2tog knit remaining stitches 20 stitches work 2 more row in stockinette stitch then 4 row of k2p2 ribbing bind off using sewn bind off for dk weight work 3 row in stockinette stitch then 4 row of k2p2 ribbing bind off using sewn bind off weave in ends block if desired make second mitt the same as the first abbreviations k knit yo yarn over needle k2tog knit 2 sts together ssk slip slip knit m1r make one stitch twisting to the right m1l make one stitch twisting to the left st stitch pm place marker sm slip marker turtle tracks lace pattern from the stitch collection
